beach.name: Bora Bora, French Polynesia
beach.description: An island known for its stunning turquoise waters and luxurious overwater bungalows.

beach.name: Copacabana Beach, Brazil
beach.description: A famous beach in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, with a vibrant atmosphere and scenic views.

temple.name: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
temple.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site and the largest religious monument in the world.

temple.name: Taj Mahal, India
temple.description: An iconic symbol of love and a masterpiece of Mughal architecture.

country.name: Sydney, Australia
country.description: A vibrant city known for its iconic landmarks like the Sydney Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge.

country.name: Melbourne, Australia
country.description: A cultural hub famous for its art, food, and diverse neighborhoods.
